actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970 relative to petroleum products.

summary.text: Provides, under the Economic Stabilization Act, that the President shall permit all manufacturers and marketers at all levels of distribution of petroleum products a dollar-for-dollar pass through for increases in the cost of such products and the raw materials from which they are derived.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970 relative to petroleum products.
